AboutPage.title: About Simpul Academy
AboutPage.description: Get to know us better, how we started, and what drives our passion to contribute to the academic world.
AboutPage.history_p1: Simpul Academy was born from a simple 'node' of discussion in a coffee shop in Banda Aceh in mid-2024. Stemming from concerns about the challenges faced by students and researchers in scientific publication, a group of young academics took the initiative to create a solution.
AboutPage.history_p2: We saw many quality research results (theses/dissertations) that only ended up in the library. We wanted to bridge that gap, turning valuable works into globally accessible scientific articles that have a broader impact.
AboutPage.history_p3: From thesis conversion services, we expanded to provide publication assistance, proofreading, and training. The name 'Simpul Academy' was chosen to represent our role as a connector and simplifier of complexities in the academic process, becoming a reliable partner.
AboutPage.vision_text: To become a leading, innovative, and trusted academic partner in Indonesia in supporting the realization of quality global scientific publications and accelerating digital transformation in education.
AboutPage.mission_item1: Provide comprehensive academic support services, from scientific work conversion to publication in reputable journals.
AboutPage.mission_item2: Organize training and human resource capacity building in the field of scientific writing and research.
AboutPage.mission_item3: Build a digital platform that empowers academics to collaborate and increase the visibility of their work.
AboutPage.mission_item4: Establish strategic partnerships with educational institutions, research institutes, and communities to strengthen the national research ecosystem.
